settings.title: Sarah L.
settings.review_text: What wonder is this?! This is the second mail order bamboo tp that we’ve tried as a family. And everyone prefers this one!! The dimples are helpful (to make the paper more plush & cleaning). Highly recommend!

settings.title: Brenda P.
settings.review_text: The best. Exactly as described- the STRONGEST toilet paper I have come across, and SOFT.

settings.title: Lulu P.
settings.review_text: Surprisingly soft! Cute enough to stack without using my precious one bathroom cabinet (and no dust since they’re covered) and soft enough to keep me from going back to premium store-bought!

settings.title: Shelley W.
settings.review_text: Love this TP! I was just pleasantly surprised by the softness of this toilet paper. Also it looks so pretty in the bathroom because of all the prints and colors. We love it!

settings.title: Rebecca M.
settings.review_text: So pleased! We switched from Who Gives a Crap and have really enjoyed the lovely wrappers and feel it works better too.

settings.title: Lauren N.
settings.review_text: Simply awesome. I switched to gono2 bamboo toilet paper during the height of the pandemic and I’ll never go back to normal toilet paper! It’s durable, easy to order and I’m helping the environment—that’s a win win.

settings.description: This is serious. What is butt crumbleTM ? We think this video says it all! Butt crumbleTM is essentially the unwanted gifts those other papers leave behind when you wipe. No, thank you! In fact, we decided to personally test a whole lot of different paper materials to create a smooth and silky toilet paper that’ll have you exiting the bathroom butt crumbleTM free.

In fact, we decided to personally test a whole lot of different paper materials to create a smooth and silky toilet paper that’ll have you exiting the bathroom butt crumbleTM free.

This is serious. What is butt crumbleTM ? We think this video says it all! Butt crumbleTM is essentially the unwanted gifts those other papers leave behind when you wipe. No, thank you! In fact, we decided to personally test a whole lot of different paper materials to create a smooth and silky toilet paper that’ll have you exiting the bathroom butt crumbleTM free.

When designing No. 2, we decided to max out the silkiness. What does that mean? Well, while it’s certainly soft to the touch and strong, you’ll find our unique texture unbelievably smooth and gentle on your skin.

settings.custom_description: Premium 100% bamboo TP that provides silky and strong paper for the best Butt Crumble free™ wipe.
Strong and absorbent 100% bamboo paper towels wrapped in our stylish design, delivered right to your door.
Premium 100% bamboo tissue, free from dyes, scents, BPA and irritating additives.
